Service Details: Offers optometry services that include comprehensive eye exams, pediatric eye exams, management of ocular diseases, advanced technology, eye emergencies, LASIK and refractive surgery co-management, dry eye treatment, Orthokeratology (CRT AND VST), low vision, astigmatism diagnosis and treatment, presbyopia diagnosis and treatment, treatment of vision-related learning problems in children, sports and specialty eye wear fitting, computer vision syndrome, and eye glasses and contacts
Hours: Mon-Fri: 9:00am - 5:00pmSat: by requestSun: closedEvening appointments: by request
